title: Shocking moment pilot batters his coworker after they broke up
text:
William Thomas was filmed punching coworker Marisha Sporer, who he had reportedly just broken up with, on a Republican Airlines layover (Picture: Denver Police Department/ Flyertalk)

This is the horrifying moment a pilot was filmed battering his coworker after the pair allegedly ended their relationship.

Leaked surveillance footage shows the two Republic Airways employees, 36-year-old William Thomas and 29-year-old Marisha Sporer, engaged a violent altercation after a flight landed at Denver International Airport on September 14.

The footage, originally obtained by Flyertalk, ends shortly after Thomas is seen throwing two brutal punches to Sporer’s body and head.

According to a probable cause statement, the pair had been dating since November, but the relationship ended after Sporer saw something she did not like on Thomas’s cellphone. Police did not specify what she saw.

‘They both agreed to break up so Thomas went on the plane and sat in the cock-pit and Sporer went to the gate. Sporer became angry and went onto the plane to confront Thomas,’ the statement continued.

Sporer was also arrested with assault and disturbing the peace. (Picture: Denver Police Department)

‘Sporer grabbed Thomas by the neck tie and slapped him in the face with an open hand three times. Thomas retaliated by grabbing Sporer and striking her in the ribs with a closed fist.’

Both Thomas and Sporer were arrested after the incident and charged with assault and disturbing the peace.

The altercation occurred during a layover, Denver police said. The footage was later leaked to FlyerTalk and it is now the primary piece of evidence in the investigation.

A spokesperson for Republican Airways told ABC: ‘We are aware of a situation that occurred last month involving two of our employees.’

‘We investigated this matter and took appropriate action consistent with our belief that such behavior is unacceptable.’

According to the spokesperson, no passengers were on the plane at the time of the incident.’
description: Pilot William Thomas is filmed throwing brutal punches at his coworker who had just reportedly broken up with him.
